author: Robert Shortt
title: IMF expects world economy to shrink by 3% this year
description: The IMF has forecast that the world's economy will shrink by 3% this year as a result of the Covid19 pandemic. It forecasts the Eurozone will contract by 7.5%.
content:
The International Monetary Fund has forecast that the world's economy will shrink by 3% this year as a result of the Covid19 pandemic. It forecasts the Eurozone will contract by 7.5%.
In its World Economic Outlook published today, it describes the 'Great Loc… [+1213 chars]
